preferences.title: Register in 10 minutes
preferences.description:
Our sign-up process is fast and easy. Join as a new user or switch lines seamlessly with
                                Unifi, the leading 5G telco in Malaysia.

preferences.title: Connect Everywhere

preferences.title: SIM Delivery
preferences.description:
Get your Postpaid SIM, Prepaid Starter Pack, or Device delivered straight to your doorstep,
                                so you can start enjoying 5G data plans in Malaysia without any hassle.
